thread.title: Mercy and St. Anthony's enter affiliation agreement
thread.title_full: Mercy and St. Anthony's enter affiliation agreement

author: Samantha Liss St. Louis Post-Dispatch
title: Mercy and St. Anthony's enter affiliation agreement
text:
St. Anthony's Medical Center as shown from Tesson Ferry and Kennerly Roads in May 2010. Photo by Christian Gooden cgooden@post-dispatch.com 
Mercy Health logo 
Mercy and St. Anthony's Medical Center have entered into an affiliation agreement, hospital officials said Monday. 
Details of the agreement are still being hashed out, according to the statement. 
"Leaders, board members and physicians from both organizations are working through the process of finalizing the details, with the goal of completing the agreement this spring," Monday's announcement said. 
When asked which organization would be in control or have the most board representation, Bethany Pope, spokeswoman for Mercy, said, "All of those things will come later."
